title: Clear night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A white bus drives down a city street at night with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 3.9 m/s). There are 13 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a city street at night. There are several other cars on the road, including a red car and a parked white van. The traffic light is green and there are palm trees lining the street. The weather is clear and visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety on the city streets at night. It slows down and brakes frequently due to the presence of other vehicles and potential obstacles. The driver is cautious and pays close attention to the traffic light and surrounding environment to avoid any accidents.
